about_the_game:
Events take place in the 2000s. After the collapse of the USSR, all structures ceased to function, and people were unable to unite into smaller states and got stuck in banditry and looting. Those who still managed to survive organized small armed groups and established their own orders, norms and morals. In addition, another misfortune came to the world - a shortage of various resources around the world, because of which the territory of the former union, rich in all kinds of benefits, began to attract people from all over the world.

  • Arm yourself to your taste. The game offers weapons from both NATO countries and Warsaw Pact countries. Each weapon feels different and each player will find their own. Various equipment is also presented: body armor, helmets, backpacks.
  • Find various items. At locations you will find various loot that you can use or sell.
  • Trade profitably. During the game you will earn money and will be able to buy equipment from the store's assortment.
  • Fight for victory! You have to go to post-Soviet territory and fight against other players, as well as local groups. May the best man win.
  • Character customization. You will be able to choose clothes that will open as you progress.
  • No aggressive monetization. The game does not have strong equipment for real money or battle passes. The balance of weapons and armor is designed in such a way that an inexperienced player always has a good chance of defeating a more experienced one.
  • Day/night cycle and weather. The game changes day/night and weather conditions change, which affects the gameplay. For example, for more convenient play at night, there are NVGs and flashlights.
  • Voice chat. You can communicate by voice with those who are nearby: both allies and enemies.

content_descriptors.notes: The game has stylized blood, severed limbs. You can also hear profanity in voice lines.

name: Lost Lives

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-2550k or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 1030 or Radeon 7850 HD
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3-10100F or Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or RX 570
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: Lost Lives is a multiplayer 2D shooter with RPG elements, in which you will find yourself in the conditions of post-Soviet devastation. As you play, you will have to fight other players and local factions, as well as find and sell loot. Choose your equipment wisely and defeat your enemies!
